description:
If you've got fond memories of couch-co-op games of Halo and the early days on online arena deathmatch or LAN party video games, Mantic has made a game for you. Take command of a Squad of Spartans in Red or Blue and throw down in familiar game modes in HALO: Flashpoint, based on the Deadzone system.

Thanks to Mantic for the complimentary copy of the box  to review.

description:
Welcome to the secluded region of Calabria... an isolated corner of Italy mostly unaffected by the Napoleonic Wars but very much plagued by a Necromancer problem. Your Specialist unit is tasked with discovering the reasons for a very green mist and a whole lot of Living Dead. Let's go!

Thanks to Osprey for the complimentary copy of the book to review.
